body:
Comment 14: 
@iant,

testtls is run twice, once in auto mode, once in external mode.

        go test -ldflags '-linkmode=auto' ../testtls || exit 1
        go test -ldflags '-linkmode=external' ../testtls || exit 1

I believe the auto test passes, but the external test fails, which suggests auto still
defaults to internal (in some cases)
